title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo—CLI and Go library to pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally with a built-in OpenAI-compatible REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that turns any Ollama model into a drop-in LLM for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for local Ollama models; PyPI package ‘llama-index-llms-ollama’.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, docs, users); runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich-terminal CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, markdown, and model search.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style code-completion plugin that uses Ollama models locally.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub; one-liner to run Llama 3 locally.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters; Maven Central artifact ‘io.github.ollama4j:ollama4j’.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem ‘ollama’ that exposes chat, embed, and pull APIs with native Fibers support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets pipelines use Ollama models for prompt-node and generative QA.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official .NET client library (NuGet ‘Ollama’) with chat, embed, and model management endpoints.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in replacement for OpenAI Codex using Ollama; works with existing editor plugins.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app (Rust+React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Next.js chatbot template that streams responses from Ollama with Vercel AI SDK.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a ‘Ask Ollama’ command for private note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.
